Headline: #67 67th-69th-71st Temporary Reroute at 67th/Saint Lawrence
ShortDescription: Revised: 67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted via 67th, Keefe, 68th, Cottage Grove and 67th, due to street blockage near 67th/Saint Lawrence.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Revised: #67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 67th, Keefe, 68th, Cottage Grove, then resume their normal route on 67th, due to street blockage near 67th/Saint Lawrence.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Pink Line Delays
ShortDescription: Pink Line trains running w/residual delays & congestion following an an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks at Ashland. Service resuming, allow extra time

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Pink Line trains are running with residual delays and congestion following an an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks at Ashland.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
